Name: Chameneon
About the game: Run, jump and dodge! Chameneon is a 2D Runner with unique physics that create a great challenge! Switch the neon colors and surf your way to the end. A powerful virus has infected the Cyber Space and now is up to you to control a manual message called CHAMENEON . Collect the Neon Disks to show everyone who's boss. With simple gameplay and tons of stages to go throgh, you will be tested to the limit! So what are you waiting for? It's your time to shiny!
